001package eu.andredick.tools.orlib;
002
003import eu.andredick.scp.SCProblem;
004import eu.andredick.tools.FileTools;
005
006import java.io.*;
007import java.util.Properties;
008
009/**
010 * 在本地与线上搜索Orlib 库中的问题实例名称，<br>
011 * 并调用相关脚本进行解析。
012 */
013public class OrlibConverter {
014
015    public static String orlibUrl = "http://people.brunel.ac.uk/~mastjjb/jeb/orlib/files/";
016    /**
017     * 本地scp数据集所在位置
018     * 后缀为 .txt
019     */
020    public static String resourcePathLocalOrlibOrigins = "resources\\orlib\\origins\\";
021    /**
022     * scp数据集所在位置
023     * 后缀为 .jar
024     */
025    public static String resourcePathPackageOrlibOrigins = "/resources/orlib/origins/";
026    public static String resourcePathPackageOrlibMPS = "/resources/orlib/mps/";
027
028
029    public static String[][] scp4 = {{"SCP4"}, {"scp41", "scp42", "scp43", "scp44", "scp45", "scp46", "scp47", "scp48", "scp49", "scp410"}};
030    public static String[][] scp5 = {{"SCP5"}, {"scp51", "scp52", "scp53", "scp54", "scp55", "scp56", "scp57", "scp58", "scp59", "scp510"}};
031    public static String[][] scp6 = {{"SCP6"}, {"scp61", "scp62", "scp63", "scp64", "scp65"}};
032    public static String[][] rail = {{"RAIL"}, {"rail507", "rail516", "rail582", "rail2536", "rail2586", "rail4284", "rail4872"}};
033    public static String[][] scpa = {{"SCPA"}, {"scpa1", "scpa2", "scpa3", "scpa4", "scpa5"}};
034    public static String[][] scpb = {{"SCPB"}, {"scpb1", "scpb2", "scpb3", "scpb4", "scpb5"}};
035    public static String[][] scpc = {{"SCPC"}, {"scpc1", "scpc2", "scpc3", "scpc4", "scpc5"}};
036    public static String[][] scpd = {{"SCPD"}, {"scpd1", "scpd2", "scpd3", "scpd4", "scpd5"}};
037    public static String[][] scpe = {{"SCPE"}, {"scpe1", "scpe2", "scpe3", "scpe4", "scpe5"}};
038
039    public static String[][] scpnre = {{"SCPNRE"}, {"scpnre1", "scpnre2", "scpnre3", "scpnre4", "scpnre5"}};
040    public static String[][] scpnrf = {{"SCPNRF"}, {"scpnrf1", "scpnrf2", "scpnrf3", "scpnrf4", "scpnrf5"}};
041    public static String[][] scpnrg = {{"SCPNRG"}, {"scpnrg1", "scpnrg2", "scpnrg3", "scpnrg4", "scpnrg5"}};
042    public static String[][] scpnrh = {{"SCPNRH"}, {"scpnrh1", "scpnrh2", "scpnrh3", "scpnrh4", "scpnrh5"}};
043
044    public static String[][] scpclr = {{"SCPCLR"}, {"scpclr10", "scpclr11", "scpclr12", "scpclr13"}};
045    public static String[][] scpcyc = {{"SCPCYC"}, {"scpcyc06", "scpcyc07", "scpcyc08", "scpcyc09", "scpcyc10", "scpcyc11"}};
046
047
048    public static String[][][] instanceSets = {scp4, scp5, scp6, scpa, scpb, scpc, scpd, scpe, scpnre, scpnrf, scpnrg, scpnrh, scpclr, scpcyc, rail};
049
050
051    public static SCProblem getProblem(String instanceName) {
052        SCProblem problem = null;
053
054        String setName = findSetNameForInstance(instanceName);
055        if (setName != null) {
056            AbstractConverter converter = findConverter(setName);
057            if (converter != null) {
058                InputStream inputStream = findStreamForInstance(instanceName);
059                if (inputStream != null) {
060                    problem = convertProblemFromStream(inputStream, converter);
061                } else System.out.println("OrlibConverter：无法创建 InputStream - " + instanceName);
062            } else System.out.println("OrlibConverter： 找不到 SetName 的转换器 - " + setName);
063        } else System.out.println("OrlibConverter：未列出实例名称 - " + instanceName);
064
065
066        return problem;
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * Orlib 实例的文件具有不同的格式
071     * 此方法将格式转换器映射到抽象问题集的每个名称
072     *
073     * @param setName: 抽象问题集名称
074     * @return 合适的转换器
075     */
076    private static AbstractConverter findConverter(String setName) {
077        AbstractConverter converter = null;
078        setName = setName.toUpperCase();
079        switch (setName) {
080            case "RAIL":
081                converter = new ConverterRail();
082                break;
083            default:
084                converter = new ConverterStandard();
085        }
086        return converter;
087    }
088
089    private static InputStream findStreamForInstance(String instanceName) {
090        InputStream inputStream = null;
091        if (inputStream == null) {
092            inputStream = FileTools.getStreamFromPackageFile(resourcePathPackageOrlibOrigins, instanceName + ".txt");
093        }
094        if (inputStream == null)
095            System.out.println("OrlibConverter: 未找到 JAR 文件 - " + resourcePathPackageOrlibOrigins + instanceName + ".txt");
096
097        if (inputStream == null) {
098            File file = new File(resourcePathLocalOrlibOrigins + instanceName + ".txt");
099            if (FileTools.existsLocalFile(file)) {
100                inputStream = FileTools.getStreamFromLocalFile(file);
101            }
102        }
103        if (inputStream == null)
104            System.out.println("OrlibConverter：找不到本地文件 - " + resourcePathLocalOrlibOrigins + instanceName + ".txt");
105
106        if (inputStream == null) {
107            File localResPath = new File(resourcePathLocalOrlibOrigins);
108            //从线上下载数据集，并保存到本地
109            if (FileTools.existsLocalFolder(localResPath) || localResPath.mkdirs()) {
110                if (FileTools.existsOnlineFile(orlibUrl + instanceName + ".txt")) {
111                    File destFile = new File(resourcePathLocalOrlibOrigins + instanceName + ".txt");
112                    FileTools.downloadFile(orlibUrl + instanceName + ".txt", destFile);
113                    inputStream = FileTools.getStreamFromLocalFile(destFile);
114                } else if (FileTools.existsOnlineFile(orlibUrl + instanceName + ".gz")) {
115                    File gzFile = new File(resourcePathLocalOrlibOrigins + instanceName + ".gz");
116                    FileTools.downloadFile(orlibUrl + instanceName + ".gz", gzFile);
117                    File txtFile = new File(resourcePathLocalOrlibOrigins + instanceName + ".txt");
118                    FileTools.extractFileFromGZIP(gzFile, txtFile);
119                    inputStream = FileTools.getStreamFromLocalFile(txtFile);
120                }
121            } else System.out.println("OrlibConverter: 无法创建本地文件夹 - " + localResPath);
122
123        }
124        return inputStream;
125    }
126
127    public static SCProblem convertProblemFromStream(InputStream in, AbstractConverter converter) {
128        SCProblem problem = null;
129        try {
130            problem = converter.convert(in);
131
132        } catch (IOException e) {
133            e.printStackTrace();
134        }
135
136        try {
137            in.close();
138        } catch (IOException e) {
139            e.printStackTrace();
140        }
141
142        return problem;
143    }
144
145    public static String findSetNameForInstance(String instanceName) {
146        String setName = null;
147        for (String[][] pSet : instanceSets) {
148            for (String iName : pSet[1]) {
149                //忽略大小写进行比较，如果相等，则返回 0
150                if (iName.toUpperCase().compareToIgnoreCase(instanceName) == 0) {
151                    return pSet[0][0];
152                }
153            }
154        }
155        return null;
156    }
157
158    public static String[] getInstanceNamesOfProblemSet(String problemSetName) {
159        for (String[][] pSet : instanceSets) {
160            if (pSet[0][0].compareToIgnoreCase(problemSetName) == 0) {
161                return pSet[1];
162            }
163        }
164        return null;
165    }
166
167    public static String[] getNamesOfInstanceSets(){
168        String[] names = new String[instanceSets.length];
169        for (int i = 0; i < names.length; i++){
170            names[i] = instanceSets[i][0][0];
171        }
172        return names;
173    }
174
175
176    public static Float getExactValue(String instanceName) {
177        Properties values = getExactValues();
178        String property = values.getProperty(instanceName);
179        Float exactValue = (property == null) ? null : Float.valueOf(property);
180        return exactValue;
181    }
182
183    public static void saveExactValues(Properties properties) {
184        File file = new File(resourcePathLocalOrlibOrigins + "exactvalues.properties");
185
186        properties.putAll(properties);
187        try {
188            properties.storeToXML(new FileOutputStream(file), "");
189        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
190            e.printStackTrace();
191        } catch (IOException e) {
192            e.printStackTrace();
193        }
194    }
195
196    public static Properties getExactValues() {
197        Properties properties = new Properties();
198        InputStream inputStream = null;
199        File file = new File(resourcePathLocalOrlibOrigins + "exactvalues.properties");
200        if (FileTools.existsLocalFile(file)) {
201            try {
202                inputStream = new FileInputStream(file);
203            } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
204                e.printStackTrace();
205            }
206        } else {
207            inputStream = FileTools.getStreamFromPackageFile(resourcePathPackageOrlibOrigins, "exactvalues.properties");
208        }
209        try {
210            properties.loadFromXML(inputStream);
211        } catch (IOException e) {
212            e.printStackTrace();
213        }
214        return properties;
215    }
216
217}
